'''Reinforced deepslate''' is a [[block]] that generates exclusively in [[ancient cities]]. It has high [[Breaking#Blocks by hardness|hardness]], is immune to [[explosion]]s, and cannot be pushed by [[piston]]s or obtained in [[Survival]] mode.

== Obtaining ==
Reinforced deepslate is not obtainable in Survival, even with [[Silk Touch]], and is only available through the Creative inventory, [[pick block]], or [[commands]].

=== Breaking ===
Reinforced deepslate has no tool associated with it, meaning it is mined at the exact same speed regardless of the tool used.

Reinforced deepslate drops nothing when destroyed. It also cannot be destroyed by the [[ender dragon]] and [[wither]].

{{breaking row|horizontal=1|Reinforced Deepslate|drop=0}}

=== Natural generation ===
56 blocks of reinforced deepslate are found in the central part of each [[ancient city]], creating a frame-like structure.

== Usage ==
Reinforced deepslate has no uses besides decoration.

=== Piston interactivity ===
Reinforced deepslate cannot be pushed by [[piston]]s or pulled by [[sticky piston]]s.

== Trivia ==
[[File:Sculk Portal BE1.png|alt=An unused Reinforced Deepslate type. Notice the hole.|thumb|width=154x154|An unused reinforced deepslate type. Notice the hole.]]
* According to [[Brandon Pearce]], reinforced deepslate's job is to add mystery.<ref>{{tweet|GhirkinThe|1496948460628545539|Could you maybe explain what's up with reinforced deepslate? Like why rank it an S?|February 24, 2022}}<br>{{tweet|kingbdogz|1496948660684439554|People are talking about it a lot, which shows it did its job of adding mystery.|February 24, 2022}}<br>{{tweet|GhirkinThe|1496949392229601281|Interesting|February 24, 2022}}</ref>
* Despite being unobtainable in-game, in ''[[Craft Your Own Adventure: Wild Tales]]'' there is a path where the player is able to mine and obtain it.<ref>{{mcnet|craft-your-own-adventure--wild-tales/north#minereinforceddeeplsate|North|June 2, 2022|Sofia Dankis, Cristina Anderca, Sophie Austin, and Per Landin}}</ref>
* Reinforced deepslate is the hardest block in ''Minecraft'', with 55 hardness.
